text_en: If a child is observed when playing with other children, the way of communication can reveal hearing impairments.
The childs gestures can detect hearing loss.
Visual representations of objects can make the learning of signs easier.
Silicone material is used to make an impression of the ear. It is quick and easy, so a patient coming in for an hour can go away with a hearing aid.
All the hearing aids are custom fitted for the patients.
The hearing aid is ready to use.
